website_summaries.verdict: Large variety pack of balloons for a quality price.
pros: Rainbow colors are vibrant and fun
Pack of 100, sits at a low price point
Durable latex material can be inflated up to 12 inches
cons: Balloons are not as opaque as they appear

customer_reviews.title: Not assorted, broken and dirty
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these balloons because I needed almost every color to make balloon columns for a birthday party. However I received a bag where 29 balloons were dark pink, 19 red 12 blue, and for the other colors received between 1-3, including whites and blacks which are not included. Some balloons were broken and others covered in a brown dust which I highly doubt is latex. Thank goodness I purchased them ahead of time because I’m returning them right away.
customer_reviews.author: twinklestar

customer_reviews.title: Love the product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!!! I inflate them 3 days before the party and they lasted in perfect conditions. Once i put them outside they started to pop after 5 or 6 hours but they were against bushes and at 82 degrees . Im super satisfied. Colors are beautiful and bright!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted her birthday party theme to be shopkins - that requires balloons in all colors of the rainbow. We didn’t really need 100 but from last experience - you get a lot of lemons so better to have more. These really surprised me because although the cheap price the quality was awesome! The only balloons that popped were those that my young son filled too much air with (so not the product fault)! The colors are bright (see pictures). At the end of the party all the kids stayed to play with them, held really really well.
customer_reviews.author: Ktanot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal for quality balloons!
customer_reviews.text: Our very talented team member was able to create this amazing balloon arch for our work function! The colors and quality of the balloons are great! We did have a small quantity of balloons pop while filling them. It could have been a bad balloon or overfilling on our part. But the popped balloons were minimal. They looked great and were a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi C.

customer_reviews.title: They are hard to blow and they easily pop
customer_reviews.text: I bought these balloons for my twins birthday party, they are hard to blow up, so I definitely recommend using a pump, several balloons begin to pop even before the party began. This is my first time buying balloons online, next time I’ll just buy the ones I usually buy at walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Viri

customer_reviews.title: Easy to blow up and tie! Great colors, too!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality balloons. They blow up easily and are stretchy enough to make tying them a cinch. That stretchiness may mean the material is thin and won’t hold for long, but we shall see. For now, 5 stars for ease of use and the nice variety of colors in the package.
customer_reviews.author: glouise

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and cheap material
customer_reviews.text: The colors are nice and bright but the balloons pop very easily. Very thin and cheap material. Would not recommend for children.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Worst balloon purchase ever. They don’t match the color on the picture. They would NOT hold helium at all. Full of latex powder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price & quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved these balloons were easy to use and didn’t pop while blowing up. Also I truly appreciated that they were great quality balloons for a price that doesn’t break the bank. My little ones were so happy with this purchase. 💛😊
customer_reviews.author: Britney Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Not very strong
customer_reviews.text: I had several of them break just attempting to blow them up. Pretty thin latex. I've used stronger, sturdier balloons before.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity Pines

customer_reviews.title: Great balloons, but really disappointed with the colors
customer_reviews.text: Great balloons, so only 3 stars because I am very picky on the color! They are see through, kind of opaque. Not solid, not bright enough. If you don’t care about color I would recommend! But if you’re looking for solid bright rainbow balloons, this is not it. See photo :)
customer_reviews.author: Sara Young

customer_reviews.title: Slow shipping but great balloons
customer_reviews.text: Awesome balloons! They were larger than your average plain balloons. I’m so glad we got these. Took a while for them to ship, but we still got them in time so I was okay with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: These were just OK. They were easy to blow up but out of the 16 I used, four of them had a hole and deflated quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MsSCMomof4

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, but no wear near 12 inches.
customer_reviews.text: These balloons were nice colors and looked exactly as pictured. However, they were no were near 12 inches, more like 6-7 inches. If they were blown up anymore, they would have popped. One or two of them that I tried to use had holes in them, but that’s to be expected, I guess. They did the trick for the party, but I would probably order a different brand next time. •if you found this review helpful, please let Amazon know by clicking the helpful button down below! Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Felici

customer_reviews.title: Not the color range I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I chose these balloons because of the range of colors shown in the photos. I wanted them to match the decor at my son's first birthday party. When these arrived, the quality was ok, but the colors are only primary. The photos were misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L. Spatz

customer_reviews.title: Do you like having balloons pop randomly due to a slight breeze of walking by them?
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, no. I don't enjoy having the crap scared out of me randomly throughout the day/night after having a balloon arch filled with these poor quality balloons. They weren't overfull, yet they would just randomly pop during dinner, while the kids were sleeping, at 3 am. No thanks. I have used various balloons to fill arches and these are by far the least durable.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for my event. After filling them with helium, they kept their color, maintained their shape and remained floating beyond my 10 hour event.
customer_reviews.author: Seven

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I somehow created this birthday tradition for my kids where they wake up to a bunch of balloons and a birthday banner. It's expected, and I often find myself forgetting and having to run out and find balloons in the middle of the night so as not to disappoint. I finally bought this big bag and I'm really glad I did. I've blown up a lot of different balloons over the years and these are really easy, sturdy, and can actually get pretty big if you want. They're pretty easy to tie compared to others too. I actually just bought them a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Joel and Aimee

customer_reviews.title: About 1/3 of them have holes in them.
customer_reviews.text: about 1/3 of the ballons have tiny pinholes in them, in various places. Some of the holes were small enough to not be immediately noticeable, which meant that when we built our balloon garland the night before, it looked fine, and we awoke the next morning to about 20 completely deflated balloons. Never thought quality control would be an issue on something as simple as a latex balloon, but I guess that's why there are certain things you shouldn't buy online. Seller also offers an incentive for leaving positive reviews, which if I'm not mistaken is against amazon's rules (if it isn't, it should be).
customer_reviews.author: Matt C

customer_reviews.title: Great Balloons!
customer_reviews.text: I saw that some reviewers complained that the balloons are thin, and explode easily. And in response, I'd like to present a complex theoretical notion: If you want thicker balloons, PUT LESS AIR/HELIUM IN THEM! Especially if the ambient temperature will eventually heat up. This ain't rocket science! Only a little less inflation, and you'll have much thicker/more durable balloons. I'm very happy with them. They're bright, easy to inflate, and can be blown up to anywhere from small to quite large.
customer_reviews.author: ScottyJames

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: We’re new to the whole balloon arch (didn’t know you needed an arch or tons of time/practice. These worked well!! We used a balloon pump bought on amazon also. To make an arch or more balloons, you’ll need 2 bags. Also, I didn’t know you needed different sizes. These balloons were awesome! A couple shades of blue and green (White is not included, I purchased those separately.) all in all, they completed their mission and made a 9 yo quarantine bday perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great set of balloons. Colors are true and the quality is amazing, Nice amount as well i have a lot left so this will be holding on for a while
customer_reviews.author: Michal K.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. The color selection is great. I used it with helium for a birthday party and it hold until the next day. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Inbal_Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: These were coated heavily in some type of powder and seemed to be very thin. I'm disappointed in them.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Moran

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors. Quality is alright.
customer_reviews.text: Nice array of colors. Not the best quality. Loose air quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine hodge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quarantine and beyond!
customer_reviews.text: How to entertain a 3.5 year old day after day as we weather these crazy times? With endless balloon fun. These balloons are a GREAT size - perfect for kicking, punching, inflating and letting them zing all over the house as you let the air out. They are very high quality and great colors. My son would like more blue and green and black though, of course but we can't complain. The last several days and have been a lifesaver and mood lifter in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G. Gladstone

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: I used these balloons for my son's 15th bday. I taped several on my sliding glass door and hung several with string from the ceiling. The colors were great and the quality was too. I used my air compressor to inflate these balloons and only a few "broke" but that was mostly my fault because the compressor was turned up too strong. Overall this is a great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought two packages of these for my daughters first birthday party and we used a heavy duty construction compressor to blow them up! I started on Thursday night and the balloons held up perfectly throughout the entire party. Only a few of them popped, and the kids loved playing with them! We had LOTS of balloons! The colors were great and I would recommend this product! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Izabela

customer_reviews.title: Good for simple balloons arch or balloon garland if mixed with larger balloons!
customer_reviews.text: They were ok. I normally use Qualtex balloons bc they are stronger, brighter, last longer and are more durable. However, I was in need of several colors for this circus carnival event that required several assortments of balloons. I used these for the outdoor carnival arch and they worked well. I mixed them with other balloons too!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela S.

customer_reviews.title: Super Thin and Pops Easily
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a craft project for a kids birthday party. Super thin and most of them popped easily right after blowing them up but the kids still had fun. It got the job done but next time I will be purchasing some sturdier balloons with better quality.
customer_reviews.author: SoaringEagle

customer_reviews.title: So many balloons. So many colors!
customer_reviews.text: Made rainbow arch for daughters birthday, used 72 balloons. So many bright colors, most balloons were excellent quality. I did have to throw away probably 10 balloons because of holes in them but the rest of the balloons were excellent. Bright, fun colors. I blew them up Sat and it’s now Tue AM and they’re still plump and full! 10/10. 4 stars is because of holes in balloons but would definitely take my chances and buy again. ETA: white balloons were not included in this pack. I bought them separately. Adding white balloons to the product would make this so even better.
customer_reviews.author: Bormann

customer_reviews.title: Pops easily
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to make a balloon garland for my son's birthday. Quite a few (>10) of these popped even though they haven't reached their full size yet (using an electric balloon pump). I would understand a few balloons popping but >10% is a significant amount especially for the purpose I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: So easy to tie off. We also bought some cheaper ones from the dollar store, we only ended up using 10 out of the 30 they were way smaller and cheaply made. It made it very difficult to tie off the balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Harden

customer_reviews.title: Still holding air 2 weeks after the party!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that every single balloon in the pack inflated with no problems. The party we used them for was over two weeks ago and they have still kept their shape. They were perfect for the rainbow balloon arch I made. I was able to use every color in the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Alecia Goforth

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest quality balloons. They either popped or didn’t hold air for more than a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Tingey

customer_reviews.title: Great balloons
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our yearly ball-drop we like to setup on our kids doors on their birthday. They were beautiful colors and held up very well. Exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Pak

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and evenly distributed with the colors wish it was a bigger pack but great! Update:: This is my four time purchasing from this company and they have delivered on time and the balloons lasted 3 days outside without popping !! I’m very pleased with my purchases. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Presentation
customer_reviews.text: They feel very thick but I am yet to blow them up so we should she how they work then....the pink it’s hot pink it doesn’t look anything like the picture...... UPDATE - 20 ballons came with a holewasn’t to happy about that and once you blow them up they become really thin!
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: Poor. Not even close to 12 inches
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars because these are thin and cheap. The ones I received didn't inflate even close to 12 inches. 10 inches max. The few that I attempted to blow up to 12 inches popped.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! came fast & great colors to match other "rainbow requested decor. These are easy to blow up because they are fairly thin which was great because I blew them all up on my own and scattered all over the floor for my daughters b-day - she loved it. Prob not good for helium and I gave 4 starts instead of 5 because some of the balloons had some "stuff in them so i was creeped out about sucking in chemicals/ powder when blowing them up :) and or kids popping them - its probably fine! Just wouldn't want to be doing that every day!
customer_reviews.author: CQPBmom

customer_reviews.title: Quality made
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my niece and she loved them! They're thick but not difficult to blow up and they lasted until the next visit. There was a large variety of colors and a quantity for the price. I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Colorful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to blow up and VERY colorful. Seem to last a long time inside the house in cool temperatures. Outside, in the heat, they might wilt.... but then so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, rich colors perfect for a rainbow.
customer_reviews.text: Anxious to use this. The colors are perfect. We had to go to 5 different stores to find substitutes since the package didn’t arrive in 2 days as promised. They arrived the day after the party, but I keor them since the colors are so perfect and they seem a good quality. Care Bears was the party theme.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa N

customer_reviews.title: Colorful Balloons
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these because we'd run through our stash of balloons for the grandkids. These seem fine, and the kids were delighted to have new balloons to chase around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Milholland

customer_reviews.title: Balloon a bust
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use these balloons as a catch all with my students, (to illustrate static electricity, to build an catastrophe safe structure; for field days water balloon toss) and we did complete all of these tasks throughout the year, but it was a disappoint that great many of the balloons were punctured with tiny holes. The balloons did fulfill the need if you have the time and energy to sort through the population of punctured product.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Berkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Not meant to last
customer_reviews.text: I used the balloons in my classroom for an end of year countdown. Several balloons popped immediately upon blowing up or came with holes already in them. Some have lasted 10 days without trouble, others have popped or slowly lost air over the past few days.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I had to order these for a last minute event to make a balloon creation. I am impressed by the quality of these balloons and would definitely recommend. I normally order wholesale but these worked beautifully for the event!
customer_reviews.author: Kia Divine

customer_reviews.title: It had been opened already !!
customer_reviews.text: The bag in which the balloons came in looked like it had been previously accessed . When I counted them there were only 96 balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Mishell D

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Balloons
customer_reviews.text: As expected, I received the balloons in good condition. They were easy to inflate, and were able to inflate to a good size while still being able to tie them. My kids are very rough on balloons and they seem to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Lots of good balloons
customer_reviews.text: Do you need all the balloons? Because if you order this you get all the balloons. More balloons than I ever thought I needed. Good balloons, too.
customer_reviews.author: Dina L. Giovanelli

customer_reviews.title: End up pastel. Definitely not bold
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make a balloon arch for a school carnival. They are pretty sturdy. The only disappointment was when you blow them up ... they all end up being pastels. No vivid color.
customer_reviews.author: LIZZY

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price
customer_reviews.text: Not very strong but ok for the price. I used them for a balloon garland and they were good for that, but I wouldn’t try to use with helium.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Parker

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality - a little thin
customer_reviews.text: The balloons have nice color - but once inflated, they become too transparent.. That being said, they were much better than dollar store or walmart balloons in terms of popping during filling, or staying inflated
customer_reviews.author: ByStf-RvwStf

customer_reviews.title: 75% of them had holes and were useless
customer_reviews.text: My kids were so excited about having so many balloons for our “stay at home” end of the school year party. Sadly 75% of them had holes.
customer_reviews.author: David & Saree Clark

customer_reviews.title: Balloons have holes in them
customer_reviews.text: About half of the balloons I've inflated so far have holes in them and leak air. Some have big holes that deflate within a minute or less, and some have micro holes that deflate over 1-2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I blew up all 100 balloons around midnight the night before my so s birthday. About 10 of them had holes or popped right away. By the time we woke up the next morning half were deflated and a handful popped as soon as my son touched them. The colors are beautiful and we got a decent variety of al of them but they are overall are very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Heather Flaatten

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch? Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Great colors, but most of the balloons spontaneously burst a few minutes after blowing them up. Very disappointing 😰.
customer_reviews.author: Kristel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are study balloons. Other brands purchased in the past after time loss their sturdiness but these are fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: DDM

customer_reviews.title: Good Balloons
customer_reviews.text: I wanted balloons that I could blow up by mouth. Blowing up balloons is supposed to help with acid reflux. I love these balloons. They are easy to blow up.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for work to use as birthday decorations for employee birthdays. The price is excellent and they're made pretty decent. Totally worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate website description
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this unless you really don't care what or how much of each color balloons you get. I did not receive nine colors! From the ones I did receive, they were all of different quantities! It seems they thought they could just add twice as many balloons from to cover the color that they didn't have but that was a main color I was going to use! They didn't even have the common courtesy to contact me about their shortage! They just choose to not provide what was advertised! I wont be buying this again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the price for the amount of balloons. For the most part they were very sturdy. Some balloons did have a small hole in them but when you compair a few duds to the value it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: $olace

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price for a great variety of balloons
customer_reviews.text: We plan to use this one pack of balloons for at least 2 separate bday parties. They were durable enough to withstand a pack of sugared up 4/5 year olds
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Curley

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with some colors included in the bag. Lime green was definitely not lime green after being blown up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Balloons 👍
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate. Spent like two hours making a rainbow arch with my friends. The balloons lasted inflated for about a day. The morning to evening heat along with the wind caused a few to pop toward night time.
customer_reviews.author: Klo

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: They pop soooo easy it’s crazy I barely touch them and they pop I’ve never seen a balloon pop as easy as these do I don’t even think I’ll be able to use them
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Made a balloon arch for my baby shower..... it was pretty 70° semi cloudy day. About an hour after setting up they started to pop. By 3 hours in they were gone.....
customer_reviews.author: BREE m

customer_reviews.title: Quality balloons!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality balloons! I got 2 packs because I did not want my balloons to be see-through, they work great I think maybe only two popped on me...loved the vibrant colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Ballons
customer_reviews.text: The balloons came quickly and nice mix of colors, and my sons had no problem blowing them up. They are 12inch balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good balloons
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son’s birthday party. They were easy to inflate and not flimsy material. They lasted through the day
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Decent balloons at decent price
customer_reviews.text: After trying to blow up some really crappy balloons we have had for a while, I decided it was time to purchase some new ones that wouldn't keep popping in my face or leaking air. I like the color selection of these and they seem durable. Easy to blow up and tie. A few have been blown up for 3 days and don't seem to be leaking air. They may be a bit thin but I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Seltzer

customer_reviews.title: NOT for dogs
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing premium about these. I bought them for my dog who loves to play "loon". These pop by the third tap. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: They’re great!
customer_reviews.text: I just blew one up so I’m not entirely sure how long it’ll last but it seems like a sturdy and nice balloon. I love all of the colors
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Newlon

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old and parent approved
customer_reviews.text: Great product, happy with purchase. Got them for my 2 year old’s birthday - we blew them up and tossed a bunch around the room and they lasted for days and days.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B. Horn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality- we are having lots of fun with these in quarantine! Very fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good color variety
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to decorate for an Animal Crossing themed birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl Wong

customer_reviews.title: Let the balloons fall!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter took these on a youth group retreat to use as pranks. All pranks are approved by leadership! She said they had a blast filling one of the leaders room with the balloons.” So they worked well for what they were bought for!
customer_reviews.author: MKramek

customer_reviews.title: Huge balloons love them!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. These balloons can be blown up to be huge! My 2 and a half year old son can blow them up no problem. They can get more then 12 in plus
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Don't Spend You're Money
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. The balloons were easy to fill up and tie but were very thin. They popped just from touching them. By the time I set up my son's backdrop and added the balloon garland I put together, most of the balloons popped. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: There was like 4 with holes in them other than that great price & worked well for a co-workers going away prank.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and great colors!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a balloon arch for a rainbow themed birthday party. They were great! Easy to inflate and the colors were really nice. Only one or two were defect. Would def buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pop easily
customer_reviews.text: These balloons pop easier than others I have tried. I’m not talking about in your face while blowing up, but more so when we bounce the ballon up in air inside house.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: very bright and suitable colors!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used the balloons for my Baby Shark's party decoration and the colors were very suitable, I didn't use the red balloons because I didn't see it necessary but everyone else did. Very good investment
customer_reviews.author: Marlyn Maibelli León Urbina

customer_reviews.title: Fun infinity
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t like balloons especially kids it’s definitely a hit in the party
customer_reviews.author: scrajesh

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: These are truly the rainbow, and so sturdy. Completely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: KayB

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice party balloons
customer_reviews.text: These were used with just regular air to tape to doors for birthdays or other celebrations. They are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Reliable source for cheap, pretty, sturdy balloons
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time for a birthday party. These were easy to blow up and were durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and easily pop
customer_reviews.text: Bright and pretty colors, but very thin and easily pop. It should be fine if you only plan to use them for a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaowei chen

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: A lot of ballons were popping for no reason, good thing it held up together in the end
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Not as bright
customer_reviews.text: Worked for what we needed them for.. disappointed on the color. The picture shows brighter colors than what we got
customer_reviews.author: Megan Nolder

customer_reviews.title: Went flat in an hour
customer_reviews.text: The balloons are thin and poor quality. Didn’t even hold air for more than an hour or so. My son was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hallier

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Balloons 🎈
customer_reviews.text: Very nice balloons! Nice assortment of bright colors. Perfect for a party! Colors as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Whoopie Pie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like this item starting to pop mintues after they where blown up wasn't able to use for my son party they kept popping was so upset
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Anderson

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Every other balloon had a hole in it, and they kept popping out of my mouth because the lip of the mouthpiece is so small. Pathetic and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my SIL baby shower fiesta themed & they lasted !! We blew them up & they lasted all day! No popping or anything. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Just ok baloons
customer_reviews.text: Some of the baloons had and in them and some had pinholes in them. Luckily we had enough to make the arch.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: great balloons
customer_reviews.text: for my grandson. He loves the colors. no allergic reactions
customer_reviews.author: Richard Caplan

customer_reviews.title: Look great, are big and sturdy TEMPORARILY
customer_reviews.text: These balloons are exactly what my 3 year old son wanted, they blow up big and do ok......for a few hours. Then they get soft and deflate QUICKLY.
customer_reviews.author: David S Oyler

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This item was of great value. I needed to use them in a science lab. durable.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M. Ficchi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a costume I was making. They were perfect. Balloons never deflated and not one of them popped. Even after being in the cold garage for about a month after the event the balloons were still inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Sejda
